summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4242 for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Lake Union Addition, being the alley between Woodlawn Avenue and Densmore Avenue, from North 43rd Street to North 44th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50411, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
